text:
The house is awesomely located, in a quiet neighborhood yet close to UT and other vibrant places. Everything can be done by foot. Julie was very helpful and gave us many good addresses! We were however disappointed for not having had the opportunity to meet her in person. Maybe another time! 
You'll love the cloud palace, it is a very relaxing place and beautifully decorated, we were delighted to stay there!
title: The Cloud Cabin
